---
title: "The OSC welcomes 15 new individual members"
date: 2018-06-25
subtitle: "Welcome to the Open Science Center! We want to introduce our latest members."
categories: ["New Members"]
---


<p>The OSC started in November 2017 with 17 founding members, but it didn't take long until we nearly doubled the number of individual members! With our new members, the number of represented disciplines increased to 11, covering 10 of 18 faculties of the LMU.</p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">We are happy to introduce our 15 new members, in alphabetical order:</span></p>
